text: @ProjectLincoln @realDonaldTrump If you stopped testing entirely the #covid19 statistics would improve, however more people would catch the disease and die. So this is terrible advice and he should not be holding rallies while there are over 20,000 people a day in the US testing positive. Reckless!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
